backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three background-audio-related features, their associated files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files and their responsibilities across styling, sections, media, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell containing root div and loading the Vite entry script main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA component handling passcode gating, entry/message modals, navigation to hero section, background ambiance, and full page layout.
frontend/src/components/ambient/Romantic: Renders floating heart, petal, and sparkle emoji elements with staggered animations as a fixed ambient background layer.
frontend/src/components/gallery/FlipImag: 3D flip-card component supporting image replacement via IndexedDB, with error handling and a persistent front-side upload button.
frontend/src/components/gate/PasscodeGat: Numeric keypad lock screen validating a 12‑digit passcode with shake animation and error feedback before unlocking.
frontend/src/components/media/Background: Autoplays and loops background music with fade-in, mute, and play controls, handling autoplay errors and visibility.
frontend/src/components/modals/EntryModa: Displays an entry dialog with themed styling and a button to proceed.
frontend/src/components/modals/LoveLette: Shows a scrollable dialog containing a long romantic letter.
frontend/src/components/modals/RomanticM: Renders a birthday-themed dialog with animated decorative emojis.
frontend/src/components/ornaments/Blinki: Animates a sequence of emojis that blink and scale in a timed loop.
frontend/src/content/mediaPlaceholders.t: Defines placeholder image and video lists with instructions for replacing media.
frontend/src/content/romanticMessages.ts: Exports an array of romantic text messages for displaying on image card backs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalMedia.ts: React hook for loading, saving, previewing, and clearing user-provided media via IndexedDB with object URL management.
frontend/src/hooks/useObjectPositionDrag: Hook enabling pointer-based dragging to adjust x/y object-position percentages within a container.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no queries since all data is client-side.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables and custom romantic animations including hearts, petals, sparkles, and more.
frontend/src/lib/localMediaStore.ts: IndexedDB-backed store for saving, retrieving, and removing media blobs with stable keys.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps with Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with romantic birthday text, name list, and a button to open a message.
frontend/src/sections/ImageMemorySection: Grid section displaying flip image cards sourced from gallery data with paired romantic messages.
frontend/src/sections/SurpriseSection.ts: Surprise section featuring a love‑letter modal trigger and closing romantic message.
frontend/src/sections/VideoMemorySection: Renders a video gallery with an optional edit mode that allows replacing individual videos using local file uploads and preview handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme extensions for the romantic UI style.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the romantic mobile-first birthday site.
